app.slogan: Read · Reflect · Enlighten: Uncover Kindness. Pursue Truth. Illuminate One Another.

loginByQRCode.title: Login by QR Code
loginByQRCode.scanInstruction: Please scan the QRCode above with the ClippingKK app on your phone.
loginByQRCode.downloadInstruction: If you haven't downloaded it yet, you can search for 'ClippingKK' in the AppStore.
